rules.text: You may not harass/bully people, incite violence, and/or post hate speech (e.g. racism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, etc). This includes other abusive behavior such as cyberbullying, brigading/dogpiling, doxxing, trolling, swatting, sending death threats, abusing #fediblock tag,  etc.

Do not post misinformation (Anti-Vaxx, Covid-19 misinformation, 5G conspiracy theories) or anything to extremist movements (National Socialism, Alt-Right, Ultra-MAGA,  voicing support for fascist/totalitarian regimes, etc)
Do not post images associated with hate movements, extremist ideologies or groups (Confederate States, Alt-Right, etc.).

NSFW content must be tagged approprately with content warning applied or marked as sensitive. No posting of underaged sexual-explicit content (real life/CSAM/CSEM and lolicon/shotacon) is allowed. This rule is handled differently for servers on the exception list, see about page.
Properly credit artwork that you didn’t create. Use #AIArt for any artwork that is generated from AI so users can properly filter it. Accounts may not solely post AI-generated content.
Do not post SPAM, links to scam sites, pirated materials, phishing sites, or websites that break federal laws. Self promotion is OK, as long the links are safe and does not break the above rules.
By using this service, you are expected to follow the laws of the United States of America. Refrain from posting anything that may break federal laws.
No mini-modding. If you see any post break the rules, report the post instead.

Sensitive content (e.g. violence, blood/gore, NSFW, self harm) should be put behind a content warning or mark sensitive. Demanding and/or berating users for not using CW, except from a moderator is not allowed.
Creator accounts  must be Japanese media/culture related  or inspired. This rule does not apply to non-creators. See about page for full details

You may operate bots, but they must follow our rules and must be Japanese Media related. No more than 4 public posts in an hour or 16 unlisted posts in an hour. No repetitive posts, unless unlisted. Bots cannot use AI chat bots (e.g. ChatGPT).
No impersonation accounts are allowed (of any creator or famous people) without proper identification.  Parody accounts may not be created here, RP accounts are however allowed.
